INSERT INTO ht_holidays_config(day_time)
SELECT #{item.dayTime, jdbcType=DATE} as a FROM DUAL
mapper.delete: delete FROM ht_holidays_config where day_time >= STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{year},'0101'),"%Y%m%d") and day_time < STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{year} + 1,'0101'),"%Y%m%d")
mapper.select: select * from ht_holidays_config where day_time >= STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{year}, LPAD(#{month},2,'0'),'01'),"%Y%m%d") and day_time < DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{year} ,LPAD(#{month},2,'0'),'01'),"%Y%m%d"),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)

select CAST(DATE_FORMAT(day_time,'%d')AS SIGNED INTEGER) AS first_day from ht_holidays_config_new where day_time >= STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{year}, LPAD(#{month},2,'0'),'01'),"%Y%m%d") and day_time < DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{year} ,LPAD(#{month},2,'0'),'01'),"%Y%m%d"),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) and holiday_flag = 0 order by day_time asc limit 1
